Text:
I am just curious but why is it you name your file: 27-02-2012 Days of our Lives.avi.avi instead of just 27-02-2012 Days of our Lives.avi

Now that we have to get a magnet link we can't rename directly - so gotta wait for the file to be created and then rename it :(

Is it perhaps when you encode the file from your recording that you have to make a secondary name that causes you to upload .avi.avi ?
Ops forgot to say Thanks a lot for another great upload which is high quality as well :)
jmanwf: Thanks for DooL & I don't care if there is occasional typos in your filenames!
